message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is highly in your favor considering the inflation.
Alice, my turn. Let's be realistic. Inflation is hitting you harder than me.  Take this opportunity while it's still worthwhile.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but your offer was ludicrous. This is my final compromise.
Alice, we're approaching the halfway point. This offer is still generous considering your losses will only accelerate.  Don't be greedy.
Bob, I'm compromising significantly here. Consider this: every round that passes hurts me more than you. Let's settle this now and both walk away with something substantial.
Alice, time is running out. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, but the deal won't get any better for you.
Bob, I'm sticking to my guns on this. You're playing a dangerous game with the time remaining. This offer is generous and it's the last one you'll get from me above your share.
Alice, this is it.  The clock is ticking and we're both losing out. I'm offering a more even split.  Let's be smart and take it.
